dcterms:description: 3DPW-OC is a person-object occlusion subset of the 3DPW dataset, containing 20243 persons, designed to evaluate human mesh recovery under occlusion conditions.
dcterms:title: 3DPW-OC

dcterms:creator: Yu Sun

dcterms:description: 3DPW-PC is a person-person occlusion subset of the 3DPW dataset, comprising 2218 individuals, aimed at evaluating human mesh recovery in scenarios with multiple persons.
dcterms:title: 3DPW-PC

dcterms:creator: Tianshu Zhang
Buzhen Huang
Yangang Wang
dcterms:description: 3DOH is a dataset focused on person-object occlusion, containing 1290 images in the test split, specifically designed for evaluating human shape and pose estimation.
dcterms:title: 3DOH

dcterms:creator: Hongsuk Choi
Gyeongsik Moon
JoonKyu Park
Kyoung Mu Lee
dcterms:description: 3DPW-Crowd is a subset of the 3DPW dataset that includes 1923 persons in crowded scenes, aimed at evaluating human mesh recovery in complex environments.
dcterms:title: 3DPW-Crowd

dcterms:creator: Hanbyul Joo

dcterms:description: CMU-Panoptic is a multi-person indoor dataset collected with multi-view cameras, designed for evaluating human mesh recovery in social interactions.
dcterms:title: CMU-Panoptic
